title: [BUG] The. net7.0 framework cannot run SkiaSharp in Docker, but it runs normally in Windows
body:

comments.author: zoujinhuagit
comments.body: In Docker, the. net7.0 framework cannot run SkiaSharp. Is there a dependency that causes exceptions in stream processing

comments.author: zoujinhuagit
comments.body: An error is reported when the Streamer component is received
